Author Florian Privé is a postdoc in predictive human genetics, fond of Data Science and an R(cpp) enthusiast. He is also the founder and former organizer of the Grenoble R user group. You can find him on Twitter and GitHub as @privefl and on Stack Overflow as F. Privé.
